text: James "Jamie" L. Boles Jr. (born January 16, 1961) is a Republican representative for the 52nd district in the North Carolina House of Representatives representing part of Moore County. He is currently one of the Deputy Majority Whips. ==References== Category:Living people Category:21st- century American politicians Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:People from Moore County, North Carolina Category:1961 births
title: James L. Boles Jr.
